title: font id please
content:
I love the fonts used on the lettercult.com website!  
I am a newbie here. . . can anyone identify this font for me?  
Thanks!

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [Picture 3.png](http://web.archive.org/web/20081014011125/http:/typophile.com/files/Picture%203_61.png) | 7.17 KB |

 [‹ What font did NBC use in the Beijing Olympics logo?](http://web.archive.org/web/20081014011125/http:/typophile.com/node/50248 "Go to previous forum topic") [What to charge an individual for memoir design ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081014011125/http:/typophile.com/node/50362 "Go to next forum topic")
author: carriedrazin

comments.content:
Hi Carrie,

that’s [Georgia](http://web.archive.org/web/20081014011125/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Georgia) by [Matthew Carter](http://web.archive.org/web/20081014011125/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Matthew%252BCarter), with faux [small caps](http://web.archive.org/web/20081014011125/http:/typophile.com/wiki/small%252Bcaps).  
By the way: there’s a special forum for this kind of requests, the [Type ID Board](http://web.archive.org/web/20081014011125/http:/typophile.com/forum/29).  
F
